definitions.definition: A high point or position, literally or figuratively; an elevated place; a superior region; a height; the sky; heaven.
A point of success or achievement; a time when things are at their best.
definitions.example: It was one of the highs of his career.

definitions.definition: A period of euphoria, from excitement or from an intake of drugs.
definitions.example: That pill gave me a high for a few hours, before I had a comedown.

definitions.definition: A drug that gives such a high.
A large area of elevated atmospheric pressure; an anticyclone.
definitions.example: A large high is centred on the Azores.

definitions.definition: The maximum value attained by some quantity within a specified period.
The maximum atmospheric temperature recorded at a particular location, especially during one 24-hour period.
The highest card dealt or drawn.
